content.body:
> <@littledan:matrix.org> An IBM TC39 delegate is Szabolcs https://twitter.com/_Nec

not sure what the context was but there are currently four delegates for IBM:  myself, Szabolcs Szabolcsi-Tóth, Joe Sepi, and Péter Frivalszky-Mayer
